name: Wideout Technology Services
overview:
Wideout Technology Services is an outsourcing company specializing in Rich Media production, creative design, ad operation, malware analysis, quality assurance, and web & application development.

Wideout started creating Rich Media ads when Rich Media was only just beginning. Since then, they have worked with clients big and small, creating interactive display ads and other web solutions that have engaged audiences all over the world.

Wideout Technology Services Incorporated is a Filipino company registered with the Philippine Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on May 8, 2000. It is also a BOI-registered ICT Export Company for software application development.

offices.address2: 1030 Campus Drive, McKinley Hill Town Center
